sentence: In trading on Monday, the Consumer Staples Select Sector SPDR Fund ETF ( XLP ) is outperforming other ETFs, up about 1.2% on the day.
Components of that ETF showing particular strength include shares of Dr Pepper Snapple Group ( DPS ), up about 3.5% and shares of Lorillard ( LO ), up about 3.1% on the day.
And underperforming other ETFs today is the First Trust Dow Jones Internet Index Fund ETF ( FDN ), off about 3% in Monday afternoon trading.
Among components of that ETF with the weakest showing on Monday were shares of Salesforce.com ( CRM ), lower by about 7.3%, and shares of Linkedin (LNKD), lower by about 6.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
